Jokes.Joke1: Techer:Maria please point to Americe on the map. Maria:This is it. Teacher:Well done.Now class, who found America? Class:Maria did.
Jokes.Joke2: What is the longest word in the English language? SMILES:there is a mile between the first and the last letters!
Jokes.Joke3: Q:What letter of the alphabet is an insect? A:B(bee)
